Package org.sat4j.specs

Interface RandomAccessModel

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
ICDCL<D>, IGroupSolver, IOptimizationProblem, IProblem, ISolver
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractClauseSelectorSolver, AbstractMinimalModel, AbstractOutputSolver, AbstractSelectorVariablesDecorator, ClausalCardinalitiesDecorator, DimacsOutputSolver, DimacsStringSolver, EmptySolver, FullClauseSelectorSolver, GateTranslator, GroupClauseSelectorSolver, HighLevelXplain, LexicoDecorator, ManyCore, MaxSatDecorator, Minimal4CardinalityModel, Minimal4InclusionModel, MinOneDecorator, ModelIterator, ModelIteratorToSATAdapter, NegationDecorator, OptToSatAdapter, SingleSolutionDetector, SolutionCounter, Solver, SolverDecorator, StatisticsSolver, SubModelIterator, TimeoutIsolator, Xplain
public interface RandomAccessModel extends Serializable
That interface allows to efficiently retrieve the truth value of a given variable in the solver.
Author:
daniel

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    model​(int var)
    Provide the truth value of a specific variable in the model.

  • Method Details

    • model

      boolean model​(int var)
      Provide the truth value of a specific variable in the model. That method should be called deciding that the problem is satisfiable. Else an exception UnsupportedOperationException is launched.
      Parameters:
      var - the variable id in Dimacs format
      Returns:
      the truth value of that variable in the model
      Since:
      1.6
